 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂה‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.30.32|Gen 30:32]]</sup> and (less often) **feminine**<sup>[[Jer.50.17|Jer 50:17]]</sup> ==one of a flock, a sheep (or goat)== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šuju***</u></abbr>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> plural <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, etc. (also ***wild ox***), compare Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sau***</u></abbr>, ***sheep*** [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>65</sup>, compare Id<sup>Ba NB§ 2 b</sup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">ς</span>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂה‎</span> [[Gen.30.32|Gen 30:32]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂה‎</span> [[Isa.43.23|Isa 43:23]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂיוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.22.1|Deut 22:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂיֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]] not in plural; — 

**1.** ***a sheep***, or ***goat***, noun of individual meaning of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span>: as property [[Gen.32.32|Gen 32:32]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עאֹן‎</span> collective, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשָׂבִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִזִּים‎</span>), [[Exod.21.37|Exod 21:37]] (twice in verse) (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> collective), [[Exod.22.3|Exod 22:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמוֺר‎</span>, V:8 (***id.***), V:9 (***id***; all [[BDB#E|E]]); [[Deut.22.1|Deut 22:1]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>), [[1Sam.17.34|1Sam 17:34]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זה‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] erroneous, see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), roaming pasture [[Isa.7.25|Isa 7:25]], straying [[Ps.119.176|Ps 119:176]] (simile), slaughtered [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] (in simile); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמוֺר‎</span> [[Judg.6.4|Judg 6:4]]; [[1Sam.22.19|1Sam 22:19]]; [[Josh.6.21|Josh 6:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), + id. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּמָל‎</span> [[1Sam.15.3|1Sam 15:3]] as sacrifice [[Gen.22.7|Gen 22:7]]; [[Gen.22.8|Gen 22:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.13.13|Exod 13:13]]; [[Lev.5.12|Lev 5:12]]; [[Lev.12.8|Lev 12:8]]; [[Num.15.11|Num 15:11]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּכְּבָשִׂים אוֺ בָּעִזִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>; all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.18.3|Deut 18:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>), [[Isa.43.23|Isa 43:23]]; [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהַֿצּאֹן‎</span> [[Ezek.45.15|Ezek 45:15]] compare [[Exod.34.19|Exod 34:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>), <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Vg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ9‎</span><sup>20</sup></lookup> ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.26|Lev 26]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>); fit for sacrifice [[Lev.22.28|Lev 22:28]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); unfit <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Vg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ9‎</span><sup>23</sup></lookup> ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Deut.17.1|Deut 17:1]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>); as food [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשָׂבִים וְשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִזִּים שׂ‎</span> [[Deut.14.4|Deut 14:4]] (+ id.); for Passover [[Exod.12.3|Exod 12:3]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.12.4|Exod 12:4]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.12.5|Exod 12:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); figurative of Israel [[Ezek.34.17|Ezek 34:17]] (twice in verse) (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵילִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתּוּדִים‎</span>), v[[Ezek.34.20|Ezek 34:20]] v[[Ezek.34.20|Ezek 34:20]] v[[Ezek.34.22|Ezek 34:22]] v[[Ezek.34.22|Ezek 34:22]]. 

**2.** collective ***flock:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂה פְזוּרָה‎</span> [[Jer.50.17|Jer 50:17]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן אֹבְדוֺת‎</span> v[[Jer.50.6|Jer 50:6]]).
